dialogues.text: Oh! You're back. If you find any luminous petals, Laura might finally smile at something I made.
Petals that glow pink in the dark... they're real, right?
They smell like sunrise! Laura will have to notice this brew.
That orchid? It'll taste bitter, but it might give me courage.
When you return from the Sanctum, I'll stop hinting and just tell Laura everything.
If you see a radiant band down there... I dropped it during a fight with Raphael.
The band belonged to me, not to the wedding. Find it and maybe I'll remember who I am.
Thanks for the band. I'll talk to Raphael once you're safe.
That sigil is gorgeous. Let me etch a promise into itâ€”come home.
Steel keeps my hands busy. Bring me something rarer than iron, and I'll make it sing.
Chasm ore takes an edge better than anything. Got any?
The balance on this blade is thanks to you. There's hotter metal deeper in.
That embered alloy should fix my reputation.
Whatever waits in the Sanctum, this forge is ready when you get back.
If you stumble on an antique emblem, don't tell anyone. I pawned mine when debts came due.
Those emblems used to mean something. Now they're just leverage.
With the emblem back, I can tear up a few IOUs. Got room for more secrets?
Somewhere down there is a sealed ledger of who profited from the Sanctum.
Ledger's ash, promises kept. Thanks for letting me choose.
